Dopo aver messo in piedi la vecchia squadra, Crunch organizza nei minimi dettagli il piano per rubare un antichissimo libro dal valore inestimabile..............

[img]http://s19.postimg.org/fzn6g380j/1_story.png[/img]

Crunch Calhoun (Kurt Russell), a third rate motorcycle daredevil and semi-reformed art thief, agrees to get back into the con game and pull off one final lucrative art theft with his untrustworthy brother, Nicky (Matt Dillon). Reassembling the old team, Crunch comes up with a plan to steal a priceless historical book, but the successful heist leads to another far riskier plan devised by Nicky......
